channel.title: S4/HANA News Feed
channel.description: Latest updates from the S4/HANA News Team

item.title: Announcement
item.description: Dait, Haydee (DFO/MPO) We have increased the capacity to 150 participants. You will now be able to register for one of the two English Journal Entries (Voucher) training sessions at https://intranet.ent.dfo-mpo.ca/cfo-dpf/en/node/1814.
